## [GradientCondition](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/gradient-condition)

### Methods

|                                                            Method                                                             |                                               Return type                                               |                               Brief description                                |
|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [getMaxColorObject()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/gradient-condition#getMaxColorObject()) | [Color](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/color)                          | Gets the color set for the maximum value of this gradient condition.           |
| [getMaxType()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/gradient-condition#getMaxType())               | [InterpolationType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/interpolation-type) | Gets the interpolation type for the maximum value of this gradient condition.  |
| [getMaxValue()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/gradient-condition#getMaxValue())             | `String`                                                                                                | Gets the max value of this gradient condition.                                 |
| [getMidColorObject()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/gradient-condition#getMidColorObject()) | [Color](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/color)                          | Gets the color set for the midpoint value of this gradient condition.          |
| [getMidType()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/gradient-condition#getMidType())               | [InterpolationType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/interpolation-type) | Gets the interpolation type for the midpoint value of this gradient condition. |
| [getMidValue()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/gradient-condition#getMidValue())             | `String`                                                                                                | Gets the midpoint value of this gradient condition.                            |
| [getMinColorObject()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/gradient-condition#getMinColorObject()) | [Color](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/color)                          | Gets the color set for the minimum value of this gradient condition.           |
| [getMinType()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/gradient-condition#getMinType())               | [InterpolationType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/interpolation-type) | Gets the interpolation type for the minimum value of this gradient condition.  |
| [getMinValue()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/gradient-condition#getMinValue())             | `String`                                                                                                | Gets the minimum value of this gradient condition.                             |
